title: Superconductor Scientist Faces Investigation as a Paper Is Retracted
description: The University of Rochester will examine the work of Ranga Dias, who was an author of a materials science paper unrelated to his superconductor research that was retracted on Tuesday.

title: X Reverses Slowed Access to News Outlets, but Rival Sites Still Affected
description: Elon Musk’s social media service “throttled” access to sites such as Substack and Facebook, according to an analysis, but began reversing the slow access to news sites.

title: A.I. Can’t Build a High-Rise, but It Can Speed Up the Job
description: Developers are embracing artificial intelligence tools like drones, cameras, apps and robots, which can reduce the timelines and waste that have made construction increasingly costly.

title: First Solar Finds That Forced Labor Was Used in Its Malaysian Ops
description: The company, First Solar, said an internal review had found that subcontractors used unethical recruitment tactics and withheld pay from workers.

title: Prosecutors Detail Evidence Against Sam Bankman-Fried
description: In a filing, prosecutors laid out the evidence they plan to use to convict the founder of the failed crypto exchange FTX, who faces trial in October.
